title: League HIghlights Replay Help
body: So i have Sony Vegas Pro 14 and i tried adding saved highlights from the league of legends client but when i try to open the league video clip files it says this type of file can not be opened, i converted the files to AVI files and it said the same thing, any help on what to do? I want to make a ontage of my clips but i cant import the videos

replies.body: Make sure that you're using the client to turn your replays into a highlight first, and then you should be able to use something like VLC Media Player to open those files. If you're still having problems getting them to open up, go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can take a look for you ^_^!
